name: MIZAR (Module for Interactive visualiZation from Astronomical Repositories)
tagline: Contains the module for Sitools2 using GlobWeb
body:
### Welcome to MIZAR ###
MIZAR is a sky browser showing a realistic sky in 3D by providing the possibility to access and mix data from different scientific laboratories

#### Architecture ####
![](http://raw.githubusercontent.com/SITools2/RTWeb3D/gh-pages/images/architecture.png)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
